title: Statutes

1819: Regulation of the Royal Hospital of Santa Isabel in the city of Funchal
1822: Statutes and Regulations of the Funchal Society of Friends of Sciences and Arts
1829: Commitment (of the Confraternity of N. Senhora da Graça, patron of the Parish Church of Estreito de Câmara de Lobos
1840: Regulation of the National and Royal Hospital of Santa Isabel in the city of Funchal
1850: Statutes of the Madeiran Agricultural Society
1854: Statutes of the Club União Society, Madeira
1856: Statutes of the Club-Economic Society, Funchal, Statutes of the Recreational Club, Madeira
1857: Statutes of the Congregation of Our Lady of Solitude, Funchal
1861: Statutes of the Hope Society in Funchal, Madeira Island, Funchal
1862: Statutes of the Charity Association of Funchal, Madeira
1863: Statutes of the Humanitarian Society of Funchal, Funchal
1872: Statutes of the Charity Association of Funchal, Madeira, Statutes of the Funchal Club Society, Funchal
1874: Statutes of the Catholic Association of Funchal, Funchal
1875: Statutes of the Commercial Bank of Madeira, Porto, Statutes of the Cooperative Society of Consumption and Credit of Funchal, Funchal
1876: Statutes of the Catholic Association of Funchal with the Regulation for the execution of articles 4th and 48th, Funchal
1877: Statutes of the Funchal Club, Funchal, Statutes of the Madeiran Insurance Company, Funchal
1878: Statutes of the Madeiran Association for the Promotion of Public Good and Mutual Aid, Funchal
1879: Statutes of the Charity Association of Funchal, Madeira, Statutes of the Club-União Society of Funchal, Funchal, Statutes of the Club-Restoration Society of Funchal, Funchal
1880: Commitment of the Confraternity of Nossa Senhora do Monte do Carmo established in the church of the same name, Funchal
1887: Statutes of the Congregation of Our Lady of Solitude
1888: Statutes of the Madeira Musical Recreation Society, Statutes of the Commercial Association of Funchal, Madeira, Statutes of the Mutual Aid Society called the Charity Association of Funchal, Funchal
1889: Statutes of the Protectorate Association of the Poor, Madeira
1890: Commitment of the Confraternity of Nossa Senhora do Monte do Carmo established in the church of the same name, Funchal
1892: Statutes of the Philanthropic Association of Funchal Students, Funchal, Statutes of the Cooperative Society of the officials of the 12th Hunters Regiment, Funchal
1894: Foundation of the Confraternity of the Scapular and Third Order of Nossa Senhora do Monte do Carmo
1895: Foundation of the Mutual Aid Association '4 de Setembro de 1862'
1855: Foundation of the Recreio 1º de Maio Society
1897: Foundation of the Club Restauração do Funchal and the Society for the Protection of Domestic Animals of Funchal
1901: Foundation of the Association of Class of Madeiran Industrialists and the Mutual Aid Association of Female Sex of Funchal '15 de Setembro de 1901'
1902: Foundation of the Mutual Aid Association of the Monte Pio Marítimo Funchalense, the Confraternity of Nossa Senhora do Rosário, and the Confraternity of the S. S. Sacramento of the parish of Caniço
1903: Foundation of the Maternal Aid Benevolence Association of Funchal
1904: Project for the reform of the Statutes of the Mutual Aid Association '4 de Setembro de 1862' and the Funchal District Economic Box
1905: Foundation of the Mutual Aid Association Monte Pio Madeirense and the Mutual Aid Association Reform of Madeiran Workers
1907: Foundation of the Madeiran Steam Milling Company, the Mutual Aid Association '4 de Setembro de 1862', and the Funchal Guarantee Insurance Company
1908: Foundation of the Assistance Association for weak children
1910: Foundation of the Confraternity of the Santissimo Sacramento of the parish of Santa Luzia
1913: Foundation of the Mutual Aid Association Monte Pio Madeirense and the attached Economic Box, and the Class Association of Madeiran Chauffeurs
